content: TOKYO  Oct 16 An equal joint venture of Mitsui & Co and Celanese Corp began production of methanol at a plant in Dallas  Texas  as scheduled  with an annual production capacity of 1.3 million tonnes  the Japanese trading house said on Friday.
name: Celanese Corporation
title: Mitsui  Celanese launch methanol plant in Texas
